snippet: The Olympic champion Maria Höfl-Riesch of Germany overcame injury to beat local favorite Tanja Poutiainen of Finland and win the first World Cup slalom of the season.
abstract: Germany's Maria Hofl-Riesch overcomes injury to win first World Cup slalom event of the season.
lead_paragraph: The Olympic champion Maria Höfl-Riesch of Germany overcame injury to beat local favorite Tanja Poutiainen of Finland and win the first World Cup slalom of the season.

headline.seo: Höfl-Riesch Beats Out Local Favorite to Win Slalom
headline.main: Höfl-Riesch Beats Out Local Favorite to Win Slalom
